"Buy One, Feed One" campaign programmer needed.

Submitted by Anonymous (not verified) on Tue, 12/20/2011 - 17:36

Press on FoodCircles:
http://foodcircles.net (site)
http://www.mlive.com/business/west-michigan/index.ssf/2011/11/u-m_grads_... (article)
http://www.woodtv.com/dpp/news/local/kent_county/FoodCircles-uses-dining... (interview on WOOD ch.8)
--

We need a dev, maybe two, to join the team & help us meet the expectations this city has for us. It's a GR-only movement that we hope to emplace in every city if we can get it right. Paid gig that'll be a headliner in your portfolio and could lead to a permanent position with us. Django, javascript, AJAX experience helpful but not required.

Jonathan (jonathan@foodcircles.net)
